metadata.synopsis: Player helped Astarion Vampire Lord defeat the Gur people in Cazador's Dungeon.Astarion is grateful.

1.speaker: Astarion
1.text: Hah! Oh that was very, very satisfying. Who better to test these new powers on?

0.speaker: Astarion
0.text: And who better to be standing by my side than you, who helped me get them?
